description:
Join us for a Scrum Master Retrospective.

Join Andy Hiles from Agile Rocks and Steve Trapps from The Agile Trainer for an evening of collaborative conversations.

The purpose of the Scrum Master Retrospective is to create a safe space in which attendees can raise & discuss issues with their Scrum implementations, with the group helping to share their experiences.

The format is free flowing structured conversations, using Liberating Structures, rather than a central presenter suggesting how to solve issues.

All you need to bring is yourself, an open mind, be willing to live & support the Scrum Values (Courage, Openness, Commitment, Respect and Focus) whilst in the group.
title: Bristol & Bath Scrum Master Retrospective
